user_question: How do forest ecosystems contribute to carbon sequestration, and can you generate an image of a diverse forest ecosystem?
final_answer: Forest ecosystems contribute to carbon sequestration by absorbing carbon dioxide during photosynthesis and storing carbon in biomass and soil. Image of a diverse forest ecosystem generated.
